Output format for vitae

cv_document.Rd

This output format provides support for including LaTeX dependencies and bibliography entries in extension of the bookdown::pdf_document2() format.

cv_document(..., pandoc_args = NULL, pandoc_vars = NULL)

Arguments

...

Arguments passed to bookdown::pdf_document2().
pandoc_args

Additional command line options to pass to pandoc
pandoc_vars

Pandoc variables to be passed to the template.

Contents

  • Arguments

Developed by Mitchell O'Hara-Wild, Rob Hyndman.

Site built with pkgdown 1.3.0.
